title: Creation: The Sky Above
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 1:6-8

Psalms 19:1-3; 57:9-11

Jeremiah 10:12-13

Today's passages were read by Bethany Perkins, a native Oregonian working in higher education, and co-host of the podcast No Chill Enneagram.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
